name: Bruce Wiggins
review: I got my new MacBook Pro M1 two weeks ago and could not be more happy with itThis machine___ (it feels so good against the skin on my wrists as I type)   and basically  There are so many options to customize the system too  slow and the trackpad had trouble clicking

name: Sosa Love
review: I got my new MacBook Pro M1 two weeks ago and could not be more happy with itThis machine is absolutely incredible in terms of speed looks weight/size display and battery life - and texture   so after a TON of research I decided to pull the trigger  and get the New MacBook Pro with the M1 chip.

name: Velazquez Fulton
review: I bought my Mac from Apple directly not from Amazon  This thing is amazing. Battery life is awesome. Hard to believe  that I can work with it all day and do not have to charge at all  even with bright screen. No issues with speed at all. I use Matlab a lot and this Happy I bought it

name: Burris Benton
review: It's a Mac once you go Mac you never go back. This is my second Mac my first lasted almost 9 years.

name: Cheri Dotson
review: The screen is 100% accurate (close enough) out of the box - The reason I got the macbook pro is because of the issues I was having with my 15 Dell XPS, which is a beast, color discrepancy when exporting. The colors were always over saturated and I had to.

name: Cote Sweet
review: this is a M1 model - It is fast, it is light, it is powerful, it wakes up in seconds..... it saves me time like crazy, no longer the annoying ball.... - it replaces my old and faithful MacBook Pro late 2013 (yes! 2013) - everything works from the beginning..... in my older Mac - ..... - well done!

name: I got this for $1099, which it's $1299 if you buy it from Apple, which makes no sense! It was either this or the Macbook Air for $899 (which is $999 at Apple). I got this because I've had many Macbook Airs and wanted something different. If I had to do it again, and wanted to save money
